00014 #ifndef U_TIMESTAMP_H
00015 #define U_TIMESTAMP_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/ssl/pkcs7.h>
00018 
00019 #include <openssl/ts.h>
00020 
00021 /* A time-stamp token is obtained by sending the digest value of the given data to the Time-Stamp Authority (TSA).
00022  * The returned time-stamp token is a signed data that contains the digest value, the identity of the TSA, and
00023  * the time of stamping. This proves that the given data existed before the time of stamping.
00024  *
00025  * NOTE: the term time-stamp token used does NOT refer to the TSA's response to a requesting client, but the
00026  * token generated by the TSA, which is present within this response. In the case of RFC 3161 [10] protocol,
00027  * the time-stamp token term is referring to the timeStampToken field within the TimeStampResp element
00028  * (the TSA's response returned to the requesting client).
00029  */
00030 
00031 class Url;
00032 
00033 class U_EXPORT UTimeStamp : public UPKCS7 {
00034 public:
00035 
00042         static TS_RESP* readTimeStampResponse(const UString& x);
00043 
00044         UTimeStamp(const UString& x) : UPKCS7(0,0)
00045                 {
00046                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTimeStamp, "%.*S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x))
00047 
00048                 response = readTimeStampResponse(x);
00049 
00050                 if (response) pkcs7 = (PKCS7*) U_SYSCALL(TS_RESP_get_token, "%p", response);
00051                 }
00052 
00053         UTimeStamp(UString& request, Url& TSA);
00054 
00059         ~UTimeStamp()
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTimeStamp)
00062 
00063                 if (response)
00064                         {
00065                         U_SYSCALL_VOID(TS_RESP_free, "%p", response);
00066 
00067                         pkcs7 = 0;
00068                         }
00069                 }
00070 
00071         // VARIE
00072 
00073         bool isValid() const
00074                 {
00075                 U_TRACE(0, "UTimeStamp::isValid()")
00076 
00077                 U_RETURN(response != 0);
00078                 }
00079 
00080         static bool isTimeStampToken(PKCS7* p7);
00081         static bool isTimeStampResponse(const UString& content);
00082 
00083         static UString createQuery(int alg, const UString& data, const char* policy, bool bnonce, bool bcert);
00084 
00085         // DEBUG
00086 
00087 #ifdef DEBUG
00088         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 protected:
00092         TS_RESP* response;
00093 
00094 private:
00095         UTimeStamp(const UTimeStamp&) : UPKCS7(0,0) {}
00096         UTimeStamp& operator=(const UTimeStamp&)          { return *this; }
00097 };
00098 
00099 #endif
